title: Student participation
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Tony Paice and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A program that discusses and illustrates student participation which is seen as part of the broader decision-making partnership among teachers, students, parents, principals and administrators from school to state level.
